parameters: Come out of my magic circle!
That's because you're ahead of me.
I don't know any magic that can pull you out of a magic circle.
Well, I'd be lying if I said I didn't think about it at all.
（I'll pay you back for the last time...!）
You... you were thinking about me?
I can't believe you think about me all the time.
I'm well aware that your agitation is automatic against me.
You're teasing me a little too much.
So?　Is this your magic circle?
Why did you leave the magic circle I was trying to return to?
I have business in these woods.
He flew in a magic circle directly from his own house.
I'll put my business here on hold for now.
I was trying to get back to the cave near where we were last time.
There are remnants of your magic circle, too.
That would mean you're using my magic after all!
You completely override the magic circle.
I'd have forgiven you if you'd just ruined my magic circle.
You left some of my magic in there!
I didn't know you'd use my power to warp here!
That's amazing!　I have to try to warp at the same time.
And you're using my magic without my permission.
Well, I've got things to do, so I'll just...
Leave all of your magic behind!
It was my fault, wasn't it?
You can take it from me.
How much magic do you think you've consumed in this battle?
Even if you were to offer me all of your magic right now.
Of course you did!　You lost the game.
Who would be stupid enough to take what is offered to them?
You, after I screw you over with everything I've got, I'm gonna take it all away...
I made the decision in the first place, and I'm not going to bend on that.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
I don't care what you say...
I knew I had to have you here.
Looks like we're going to have to seriously crush it...
Oh, don't be so reckless with your body!
I can't believe I've been beaten and then shown mercy...!
The healing won't work, will it?
He was a lot stronger than last time.
There was a wider range of fighting styles and tactics.
It's not easy to do what you say you're going to do.
I'm not at all happy about your compliments.
I've been training like crazy to beat you.
It's too much work to train.
I'm the one who's been quickly stealing magic from others.
Envision and train a vision to win.
I guess this is what they call a target.
（You're talking a lot. Did I hit the wrong spot?）
I have nightmares every day that I'm going to lose to you.
But you took it so seriously.
What I said to you in the last game.
It was a backhanded jab at me.
I don't want to lose to you, but I definitely don't want to give up my magic.
I'm sorry you had to leave me.
I'm glad you're trying to beat me.
Ehehe... if you keep training like that...
You didn't have to take it from me.
If I don't have a goal for you to win.
You've never been trained in the first place...
（Damn, she's getting more and more annoying...）
（The truth is, I'm busy studying ancient magic.
He didn't have time to work out.）
（And that's the reason why, in front of this guy.
I don't know what the hell is going on here.）
I'll tell you what you get for winning.
The monsters that live in this forest are
It's not as simple as that, okay?
Perhaps you, too, can't go on as you are.
Of course, you can sense the magic.
So it was a waste of time.
But why are you telling me all this?
I can't have you dying here.
It's that bad of a forest...
You said you couldn't go on.
Anyway, let's just go see what's going on.
Are you sure you're getting stronger?
How I've longed for this day!
I have to admit, I'm disappointed.
So you're just a little girl with a big mouth.
You know you're guilty of letting me down, right?
It's ......, and it's a thank you for all the fun you've given me.
I'll give you the end you deserve now.
No, no, no, no!　Get away from me!
Let me see you struggle more.
Or are you ready to offer it up yourself?
No matter how many words of apology you offer to this me.
Your value hasn't changed one iota.
The one thing I wanted to protect, hanging in the air.
You're better off rotting away in the bowels of the earth.
If you don't want to die...
If you hit the back, the suspended body will float a little.
You might be able to breathe, okay?
The rope around his neck tightened evenly around Aruru's neck.
The countdown to death has begun.
Aruru climaxed repeatedly without knowing why.
He died with a look of despair on his face...
The transfer of magical power through sexual intercourse is
It's been considered a sacred ritual since ancient times.
It has existed since that time.
The magic that dissolves from a woman's love juice is
Instantly absorbed into the male body.
Pressure from hanging or strangulation can interfere with blood flow and nerve transmissions, and can lead to
It paralyzes the brain and brings about forced climax and death...
The rope around his neck tightened evenly around Aruru's neck.
It's coming in!　It's coming in...!
This is it. This is what I wanted.
Your magic... it tastes so good.
I think we're about to hit our limit...?
If you're willing to devote your magic power for the rest of your life to me.
I can hook you up to the basement and keep you alive, okay?
Huh... if he smokes this much.
My daughter, who had been jumping around so energetically.
Stay young and beautiful, and rot away.
It's a fitting end for you.
I pulled him out of Aruru's body.
Aruru's body slowly began to shake.
The warmth of Arles will never return...
There's a stone monument. We'll be safe here!
Do you want to consume the bonfire set and rest?
Huh?　I don't have any of those.。
We'll consume one bonfire set, if that's all right.
There's a stone monument. We'll be safe here!
Do you want to consume the bonfire set and rest?
Huh?　I don't have any of those.。
We'll consume one bonfire set, if that's all right.

Do you want to consume the bonfire set and rest?
Huh?　I don't have any of those.。
